name: Halloween Thief - Haunted Pumpkin
description:
+++ 48-hour discount! 100% FREE! Be ready to be scared! +++

” Highly addictive fast paced Gameplay.”
” Adorable graphic style.”
” Exciting Levels.”
___________________________________

Halloween is right around the corner. Halloween Thief is a real amazing game with highly addictive fast paced gameplay. When you’re worked up, the game comes as wonderful, fun game to help Halloween escape and run away.

Your job will be to make every possible effort to save the Halloween from bumping into obstacles on the way. Good luck!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Adorable graphic style
Individual graphics and sound settings
Highly addictive fast paced Gameplay
Exciting levels
